ImageProgram

Class ImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageProgram.ImageManager

  • public class ImageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    An ImageManager that manages and controls the program.

    • Field Summary

      static java.util.ArrayList<ImageDirectory> collectionOfImageDir
      Collection of ImageDirectories in this ImageManager.

      • moveImageToDirectory

        public static void moveImageToDirectory(ImageObject img,
                                        ImageDirectory dest)
        Moves ImageObject from one ImageDirectory to another ImageDirectory.
        Parameters:
        img - The ImageObject to move.
        dest - The ImageDirectory to move it to.

      • addImageDirectory

        public static void addImageDirectory(ImageDirectory imageDir)
        Adds a new ImageDirectory to collectionOfImageDir. if the ImageDirectory already in collectionOfImageDir, then nothing is added.
        Parameters:
        imageDir - ImageDirectory that is being added

      • removeImageDirectory

        public static void removeImageDirectory(ImageDirectory imageDir)
        Removes ImageDirectory from collectionOfImageDir. if ImageDirectory not in collectionOfImageDir, then nothing is removed.
        Parameters:
        imageDir - ImageDirectory that is being removed

      • saveTagsToFile

        public static void saveTagsToFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Saves collection of Tags as a serializable file and stores it in the given file path on the computer.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when filepath is not found.

      • saveImageDirectoryToFile

        public static void saveImageDirectoryToFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Saves collection of ImageDirectories as a serializable file and stores it in the given file path on the computer.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when filepath is not found.

      • readTagsFromFile

        public static void readTagsFromFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads serializable file of Tag Collection and instantiates it to Tag.collectionOfTags.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when Serializable object is not found.

      • readImageDirectoryFromFile

        public static void readImageDirectoryFromFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads serializable file of ImageDirectories and instantiates it to collectionOfImageDir.
        Parameters:
        filepath - The file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when Serializable object is not found.

      • findDirectory

        public static ImageDirectory findDirectory(java.lang.String directoryName)
        Find an ImageDirectory and return that ImageDirectory. If it does not exist, return null
        Parameters:
        directoryName: - Name of the ImageDirectory to find.
        Returns:
        The ImageDirectory of the given name.

      • directoryExists

        public static boolean directoryExists(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        Returns whether a ImageDirectory with the name directoryPath exists within the ImageManager.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - The path of the directory.
        Returns:
        Whether the directory exists.

      • getImagesFromTag

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ImageObject> getImagesFromTag(Tag tag)
        Returns an ArrayList of ImageObjects associated with the given Tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag to check.
        Returns:
        The ImageObjects associated with the given Tag.

      • addImageToDirectory

        public static void addImageToDirectory(ImageObject imageObject,
                                       ImageDirectory directory)
        Adds the ImageObject to the given ImageDirectory.
        Parameters:
        imageObject - The ImageObject to be added.
        directory - The ImageDirectory to add it to.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets ImageManager to a fresh state by clearing all static collections in the program.

      • createImageDirectory

        public static void createImageDirectory(java.lang.String rootPath)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a root ImageDirectory, runs it scan method, and adds it to the collection of image directories.
        Parameters:
        rootPath - The path name of the root ImageDirectory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when cannot create ImageDirectory.
